::Obfucious::
    The area around him shook with the blast.  "HEY!  I'm philosophizing 
here."  He transforms and his long legs join to form a double ended trident.  
He leaps down and lands behind Clash.  "You disturbed my philosophy now you 
must be injured."  He holds one end of the trident slightly behind Clash's 
head.  "This will only hurt for an instant."
